original_title: Nisses äventyr på land och till sjöss
overview: Nisse Andersson, a 87 year old sailor from Gothenburg, reads from his diary, Nisse´s adventures on land and at sea. He recalls 40 years at sea, when travelling across the world was a big deal. The film is an animated documentary based on an interview made by documentarian Mia Blomgren.
title: Nisse's Adventures on Land and at Sea
